mapper.insert: insert into sleep_clinic_question (question_id, userId, category_id, title, content, is_public, created_date, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES (sleep_clinic_question_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{category_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{is_public}, SYSDATE, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM sleep_clinic_question c JOIN member1 m ON c.userId = m.userId LEFT JOIN sleep_clinic_category cc ON c.category_id = cc.category_id

SELECT c.question_id, c.userId, c.title, c.content, c.is_public, c.created_date, c.saveFilename, c.originalFilename, cc.category_name FROM sleep_clinic_question c JOIN member1 m ON c.userId = m.userId LEFT JOIN sleep_clinic_category cc ON c.category_id = cc.category_id WHERE c.question_id = #{question_id}

SELECT question_id, title, c.is_public FROM sleep_clinic_question c JOIN member1 m ON c.userId = m.userId
AND ( question_id > #{question_id} )
ORDER BY question_id ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT question_id, title, c.is_public FROM sleep_clinic_question c JOIN member1 m ON c.userId = m.userId
AND ( question_id < #{question_id} )
ORDER BY question_id ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: insert into sleep_clinic_answer(answer_num, question_id, userId, content, created_date) values ( sleep_clinic_answer_seq.NEXTVAL, #{question_id}, #{userId}, #{content}, sysdate)
